javafx.stage

Class Window.TKBoundsConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window.TKBoundsConfigurator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.javafx.tk.TKPulseListener
    Enclosing class:
    Window

    private final class Window.TKBoundsConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.javafx.tk.TKPulseListener
    Caches all requested bounds settings and applies them at once during the next pulse.
